LanguageData.FE_WarCheckBox: Enable/Disable wars between NPC factions. the mod 'More Faction Interaction' also has a faction war system to try.
LanguageData.FE_HistoryCheckBox: Enable/Disable past history for NPC factions.
LanguageData.FE_HistoryCheckBoxDesc: Histories will not appear in game if disabled but will still be saved to savefile so they can appear if this is enabled again.
LanguageData.FE_ServitudeCheckBox: Enable/Disable the tribute/vassal mechanic for NPC factions.
LanguageData.FE_MercenaryBattles: Increase the threat points for mercenary battles, large number might cause large lag: {0}
LanguageData.FE_ExpansionCheckBox: Enable/Disable settlement expansion of NPC factions
LanguageData.FE_ExpansionCheckBoxDesc: Enabled every non hidden faction will have a chance to build a new settlement once in a while.
LanguageData.FE_BombardmentCheckBox: Enable/Disable the ability of hostile NPC factions with a base adjacent to a player map to rarely bomb it with mortar fire.
LanguageData.FE_JointRaidCheckBox: Enable/Disable the 'Joint raid' incident to attack a faction with an ally.
LanguageData.FE_SettlementDefenseCheckBox: Enable/Disable the settlement defense incident to defend an ally settlement.
LanguageData.FE_SiteDefenderCheckBox: Enable/Disable the settlement defense incident to defend an ally outpost.
LanguageData.FE_AdvancementCheckBox: Enable/Disable the incident where a good ally shares a tech discovery.
LanguageData.FE_AidCheckBox: Enable/Disable the Aid incident that an ally gives you aid when in need
LanguageData.FE_GiftCheckBox: Enable/Disable the Gift incident that an ally faction gives you a gift.
